price: 56. Puis Nous vous avons ressuscités après votre mort ; peut-être serez-vous reconnaissants.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: thumma baʿathnākum min baʿdi mawtikum laʿallakum tashkurūna
